snippet: Glencore International, the world’s biggest commodities trading company, has agreed to buy Xstrata in a deal that would create a company valued at nearly $90 billion.
abstract: Glencore International, the world’s biggest commodities trading company, has agreed to buy Xstrata in a deal that would create a company valued at nearly $90 billion.

headline.main: Glencore and Xstrata Strike Mining Merger, but Some Balk
headline.print_headline: Mining Merger Is Struck, but Some Balk
